1.title: The Season Begins
1.plot: Long term partners and Olympic ice dance champions Scott and Tessa struggle with their connection as they begin their competitive season early. Ballroom dance star Jean Marc Genereux comes in to give them a refresher course.

2.title: Skate Canada Training Camp
2.plot: Tessa and Scott must find a balance between their on and off ice obligations. And the pressures of Skate Camp lead to a mini-meltdown.

3.title: The Latest
3.plot: As their first international competition approaches, Scott and Tessa turn to friends and family to blow off steam. Their training intensifies but problems remain.

4.title: The First Grand Prix
4.plot: It's the start of the competitive season and emotions run high as Scott and Tessa, together with their mothers, travel to Saint John, NB for their final Grand Prix event in Canada.

5.title: Preparation for Paris
5.plot: Tessa and Scott head to Paris, where they tour the city, and compete in the Short Dance category where they set a personal best score. Later they get a surprise visit from one of their mentors.

6.title: The Second Grand Prix
6.plot: Tessa contemplates her future as she visits friends in Paris. And the pair compete in the Free Dance, but their final score leaves them as the underdogs headed into the Grand Prix Finals in Japan.

7.title: Japan... and Beyond
7.plot: Tessa and Scott travel to Japan to compete in the figure skating finals. It's the first time they'll meet rivals Meryl and Charlie prior to the Olympics.

1.title: Episode #2.1

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: They're Canada's sweethearts. Tessa Virtue and Scott Moir are young, gorgeous, and determined to regain their titles as the world's best ice dancers. But the charismatic couple is facing challenges they never imagined when they stood on the podium after their record-breaking Olympic win in Vancouver. Tessa & Scott is a half-hour documentary series that goes behind closed doors and into the day-to-day lives of Canada's irresistible duo. With all-inclusive access never before given by Canadian figure skaters at this level, we'll go behind the scenes as their incredible story unfolds. Our cameras will give audiences an unprecedented window into Tessa and Scott's roller-coaster life of exhilarating highs and exhausting lows both on and off the ice. You don't need to be a skating fan to be entertained by the exciting, funny and heartfelt journey of one of Canada's most beloved couples.
